CutSceneText.Text: We are in the Abyss to defend Asmodae against the Balaur,
and to conquer Elysea once and for all.
To accomplish these things, we must seize power in the Abyss
by capturing key fortresses here in Reshanta.
We need to control nine fortresses in all,
The closer a fortress is to Reshanta's heart, the more valuable to us--and the Elyos.
A Guardian General leads the defenders of each fortress.
You'll see the General on your map when it appears inside the fortress.
If your Legion defeats the Guardian General and captures the fortress,
you'll gain Abyss Points, lots of Kinah,
and the usual spoils of war.
But such rewards don't come easy....
and the Balaur legions are even tougher.
It will take every ounce of will you and your brethren possess.
But on the day we claim Teminon Landing for Asmodae, our sacrifice will be worthwhile.
